physical_examinations.relevant_findings: The patient had abnormal shadows on a chest x-ray and was diagnosed with usual interstitial pneumonia.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient's general condition improved after lung transplantation in August 2003. By November 2008, her oxygen saturation was 98% to 99% at room air.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Oxygen saturation: 98% to 99% at room air.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Serologic follow-up demonstrated acquisition of HTLV-I infection post-transplantation.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially negative for HTLV-I, the patient developed a positive serologic status with antibody titers significantly increasing over time.
